articles.title: "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Vol. 2 (Enlarged Edition) Off Press
articles.content:
"Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Vol. 2 (Enlarged Edition) Off Press 
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Vol. 2 (enlarged edition), a comprehensive compilation of his famous works.
					It carries 57 works made public by Kim Jong Il from June 20, Juche 53 (1964) to August 22, Juche 57 (1968) in the early period of his start of work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					In his works including "Let Us Strengthen and Develop Our Party into the Party of Comrade
						 Kim Il Sung for All Ages" he clarified ideas and theories for organizationally and ideologically strengthening the WPK in order to accomplish the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung holding him in high esteem.
					
					 Also carried in the book are works giving unique and perfect answers to the principled problems arising in increasing national defence capability including the validity of the revolutionary line of the WPK for simultaneously building up economy and defence and the issue for all the people and servicepersons to get ready politically and ideologically and carry out the military line for self-defence and theoretical and practical problems arising in economy, education, literature and art.
					
					 "The Democratic National Rights of Our Compatriots in Japan Must Be Completely Guaranteed", "Let Us Strengthen Friendship and Solidarity with the Newly-Emergent Countries" and other works expound the issue on the need for Koreans in Japan to carry out the Juche-oriented line of the movement of Koreans in Japan clarified by the President and the principled stand of the WPK on strengthening friendship and unity with the newly-emerging countries and solidarity against imperialism and ways to do so.
					
					 The book carries works dealing with tasks of leading officials to look after people's living with responsibility as their own mothers would do and the tasks of improving commodity supply and developing sports technique of the DPRK onto a high level as early as possible.

articles.title: Imperialists' Logic of "Military Threat" Blasted
articles.content:
Imperialists' Logic of "Military Threat" Blasted
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today in a signed article terms the logic of "military threat" touted by the imperialists a modern version of their logic of aggression and domination.
					 The above-said logic is becoming a "passport" of the imperialists for high-handed and arbitrary practices and a "permit card" for war, and lurking behind it is their criminal attempt to disarm the independent countries, the article says, and notes:
					
					 This is evidenced by the claims made by the imperialists that those countries which are sympathizing with their policy for aggression have "freedom" and "democracy" but those countries going against it "lack human rights and democracy".
					
					 The said logic is reactionary sophism aimed at establishing the order for world domination by strength.
					
					 The imperialists are opposing the establishment of a fair international order which respects the rights of all countries and nations of the world and opens the path of free development for them while regarding those countries struggling for it as objects to be eliminated. They are making every possible effort to undisguisedly reject and internationally isolate these countries after labeling them as "dangerous forces".
					
					 Such act can be checked and sovereignty and peace of countries be ensured only when the world progressives wage a dynamic struggle against the imperialists' crafty moves for aggression with heightened vigilance.
					
					 No matter how loudly the imperialists may talk about "military threat", the people of the countries struggling for independence and progress should increase the defence capability and be ready to beat back any aggression forces.
					
					 It is a foolish act just like pricking one's own eye with one's own finger to compromise with imperialism without principle or try to fish in troubled waters joining it. Illusion about imperialism leads to death and ruin.

articles.title: All-People Signature Campaign Goes on in S. Korea
articles.content:
All-People Signature Campaign Goes on in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- An all-people signature campaign for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration is going on across south Korea.
					 Members of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea launched a signature campaign in Myongdong and in front of Yongdungpho Railway Station in Seoul on September 16 and 18.
					
					 They urged the authorities to respect the south-north declarations and thoroughly implement them and improve the inter-Korean relations at an early date and called upon all political parties and organizations to actively turn out in the movement for peaceful reunification.
					
					 The signature campaign is going on in all parts of south Korea by organizations of different fields and areas under the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea.
					
					 The South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification joined in the signature campaign on September 21 in demand of the realization of the south-north reconciliation and cooperation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was published in pamphlet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House in Russia on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the WPK.
					The work, issued on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995), serves as an immortal great programme of party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the WPK that hewed out the new path of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the way of developing the Party as the eternal party of Kim Il Sung.
